meanings.definition: Tochered: provided with a dowry or marriage portion
meanings.sent1: The tochered bride was happy with the gifts she received for her wedding.
meanings.sent2: She felt special and tochered on her wedding day with all the presents she got.
meanings.sent3: The tochered bride danced joyfully, grateful for the dowry she received.
meanings.sent4: Her tochered status made her the envy of all the other brides.
meanings.sent5: The tochered bride's smile shone brighter than the sun on her special day.

meanings.definition: Tochered: endowed or gifted with something valuable
meanings.sent1: The tochered student was given a scholarship for her academic achievements.
meanings.sent2: He felt tochered when he received the prestigious award for his hard work.
meanings.sent3: The tochered student proudly displayed her certificate on the wall.
meanings.sent4: His tochered talent in music was evident in every note he played.
meanings.sent5: The tochered artist's paintings were admired by all who saw them.
